"items_game"
{
	"store_currency_pricepoints"
	{
		"currency_id"
		{
			"___$$$types"
			{
				"number" "1"
			}
			"___$$$regex" "\d+"
		}
	}
	"rarities"
	{
		"rarity_name"
		{

			}
			"___$$$regex" ".+"
		}
